# touches(for:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the touch objects that are being delivered to the specified gesture recognizer.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func touches(for gesture: UIGestureRecognizer) -> Set<UITouch>?
```

## Parameters

- **gesture**: An instance of a subclass of the abstract base class UIGestureRecognizer. This gesture-recognizer object must be attached to a view to receive the touches hit-tested to that view and its subviews.

## Return Value

A set of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITouch] objects representing the touches being delivered to the specified gesture recognizer for the event represented by the receiver.
title: touches(for:)
